en: And do not mix the truth with falsehood
or conceal the truth while you know [it].
And establish prayer and give zakah
and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience].
Do you order righteousness of the people
And seek help through patience and prayer;
except for the humbly submissive [to Allah]
Who are certain that they will meet their Lord
and that they will return to Him.
